MoveCopySelect: Enter 1 to Copy files and 2 To Move files
WarningImport: When importing, the source and destination are assumed to be known working paths and are not checked. Please double Check.
PromptSourceDirectory: You must select a source directory.
PromptOrgSelect: Enter 1 to organize by creation date and 2 to organize by last modified date.
PromptOrganizationParam: You must select an organization parameter(by Creation or Modified date).
PromptMoveCopy: You must select whether the files will be moved or copied.
PromptEntersource: Enter the full path to the root of the directory files should be moved to:
PromptEnterDest: Enter the full path to the directory from which you would like to copy or move files:
PromptDestinationDirectory: You must select a destination directory.
PromptCheckResults: Check the results CSV file before running the script
MenuExport: 5. Show dates of files (Recommended before proceeding)
MenuDate: 3. Select creation date or last modified date
MenuCopyMove: 4. Select whether to Copy or Move the files
InfoPressEnter: Press enter to return to the main menu
ErrorSwitchMOveCOpy: While evaluating the Creation/Modified switch within the Move/Copy Switch Block, there was an error that resulted in the default Switch being triggered.
ErrorRunScript: An error in the RunScript Method has triggered the catch block. Please Check the Error variables.
ErrorMenuInvalid: The command you entered is not valid, please check the available commands and try again!
ErrorInvalidSelection: You entered $Selection which is an invalid Selection
